com.dhemery.victor

Class Victor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.victor.Victor

  • public class Victor
extends Object
    A Victor environment configured according to specified configuration options.

      • FRANK_HOST

        public static final String FRANK_HOST
        The name of the host on which the Frank server listens for requests. Do not include a scheme (e.g. "http://") at the start of this value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FRANK_PORT

        public static final String FRANK_PORT
        The port on which the Frank server listens for requests.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SDK_VERSION

        public static final String SDK_VERSION
        The version of SDK to use to run the simulator.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SIMULATOR_PROCESS_OWNER

        public static final String SIMULATOR_PROCESS_OWNER

        Specifies who is responsible for starting and stopping the simulator.

        If the value is victor, the constructed IosDevice's start() method will launch the simulator, and its stop() method will shut it down.

        If this option has any other value, the constructed IosDevice will neither start nor stop the simulator. Instead, the user must start and stop the simulator in some other way. This is useful for experimenting. It allows you to launch the application on your own, manually execute preparatory steps to bring the application to a desired state, then run an automated test against the prepared application.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
